entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
